subject: This week at EGCC
htmlContent:
Hi {{firstName}},


This Sunday 25th January:

10:00am - 10:30am: Prayer - all are welcome

10:30am - 10:55am: Refreshments

11:00am: Praise and Worship.

Adam will be speaking and continuing our new series on Worship.

Col 1Col 2

Special Collection - Worship Equipment: We are looking to raise around Â£1,400 for new drums and essential equipment. This will allow us to create space for more members to join the team. If you would like to give to this, above your regular giving, you can do so through our usual giving methods. Please join us in prayer and give as the Lord leads.


Our Garden Needs You! Could you lend a hand with our church garden? Can you pick up leaves, collect rubbish, cut the grass, weed or prune shrubs? Most of these things can be done as and when you are free, but for any bigger work please chat to Louisa or Adam. Together we can make the church garden beautiful so that it welcomes people into our church building.


EGCC Daily Devotions: Check out our EGCC daily devotions. A great way to reflect more on what God may be speaking to you: https://dailydisciples.uk/published?elthamgreen


{{upcomingEvents}}
